Title: Vampire Knight Transformation Pack
Description:
This program is a GUI transformation pack which can bring "Vampire Knight" style to your computer GUI.

Language: VB.NET
IDE+Platform: Visual Studio 2005 + .NET Framework 2.0

I'm not good at English.

Language: VB.NET
IDE & Platform: Visual Studio 2005 & .NET Framework 2.0
Developer: CHILINHHACKER
Time to complete:
3 months to create and collect all the GUI componets
4 months to create and build the setup
Result: Worked on virtual machine (Windows XP SP3 RC2 build 3300)


If you are an advanced user, you can try and test it. But you must read the instruction carefully. And you should create a system backup before install (although the setup will backup your system files and registry keys to \WINDOWS\system32\VKTrans folder).

If any problem happens, please read the log carefully to find the error. If your system becomes unstable, use a rescue disk, then restore all the system files (the backup folder is \WINDOWS\system32\VKTrans)

You can overwrite the setup folder without problems, because the setup config file will be saved in WINDOWS folder.

Also you can check the source code, then send me some feedback, or post some replies in the Discussion tab

Enjoy :D
